snippet.title: Hunt the Night | a Dark Fantasy Action Adventure | Full Demo Gameplay
snippet.description:
Hunt the Night | a Dark Fantasy Action Adventure | Full Demo Gameplay (No Commentary)

"Plunge into a retro-style action-adventure game that combines a fast, skilled gameplay with dark fantasy and lore. Play as Vesper, a virtuous member of 'The Stalkers,' and explore the vast world of Medhram, filled with ruins and horrors."

hunt the night game on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1649740/Hunt_the_Night/

►Become a Channel Member:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjKCvuYXHol9RMUp_4Ndpew/join
-------------------------------------------------------------
►Twitter: https://twitter.com/JamesWhoisGamer
►Discord: https://discord.gg/Dn2gR6A3qA

♥ Buy me a coffee, much appreciated!: : https://ko-fi.com/indiejames

♥ Donations: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=XRYBYX7QXU3EJ

Thank you for watching!
